Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S3 GT-i9300 32GB International Unlocked
Reviews.Author: William Brown
Reviews.Content: This is a international unlocked cell phone and it's 100% bloatware free! Samsung ships it with Android 4.0.4 but it will get updated to 4.1.1. Because of it being a international phone the charger plug isn't the standard USA type power plug.Some things you should know before ordering. It takes a micro/mini sim card and it ships from Hong Kong. The seller ships 3 to 4 days after the order. The phone box is unopened from the factory!You'll love this fast phone.I can recommend this seller (New Generation Products LLC.) and phone. :)

Reviews.Title: great international phone
Reviews.Author: Jared T.
Reviews.Content: I wanted the most International phone I could find, one that could use SIM cards interchangeably from country to country. This phone does exactly that, unlocks even without a SIM so you can still connect to WI-FI, and just makes perfect sense to get if you like to run around the world.

Reviews.Title: smartphone to have
Reviews.Author: Kevin M.
Reviews.Content: Love the phone  fast and easy to use a must have smartphone  in these time . No iphone for me

Reviews.Title: Life changing
Reviews.Author: Bruno Mendes
Reviews.Content: Great product. The only suggestion is to buy a good cover, like the UAG (It is hard to remove afterwords ) it will give you a robust feeling. In my opinion better to handle, based on my usage (this may no apply to everyone)
